abstract: The Axess DCU is a high resolution, battery powered, corrosion monitoring instrument capable of reading all types of electrical resistance (ER), linear polarization resistance (LPR) and galvanic probes. Up to 7,200 data points are preserved in the internal memory which can be downloaded to the Axess HHU via the RS-232 Serial ASCII connection.
key_points: "The Axess DCU is a high resolution, battery powered, corrosion monitoring instrument capable of reading all types of electrical resistance (ER), linear polarization resistance (LPR) and galvanic probes."
"Up to 7,200 data points are preserved in the internal memory which can be downloaded to the Axess HHU via the RS-232 Serial ASCII connection"
